scripts.build_lcu_uplink: rollup config/lcu_uplink_decoder.js --file generated/lcu_uplink_decoder.js --validate && node post_process.js generated/lcu_uplink_decoder.js
scripts.build_lcu_downlink: rollup config/lcu_downlink_decoder.js --file generated/lcu_downlink_decoder.js --validate && node post_process.js generated/lcu_downlink_decoder.js
scripts.build_lcu_up_and_downlink: rollup config/lcu_up_and_downlink_decoder.js --file generated/lcu_up_and_downlink_decoder.js --validate && node post_process.js generated/lcu_up_and_downlink_decoder.js
